resources.string: Otro clic para salir de la aplicación
Si inicia el Bluetooth del celular
Se conecta con fracso, ¿si lo intenta otra vez?
Haga clic en la tecla de sincronizar primero
1. Haga clic en la tecla de reajuste primero
2. Ajuste el puntero de hora y el minutero para que el reloj vuelva al cero y luego haga clic en sincronizar
Haga clic en la tecla de reajuste primero
"No termina de corregir el tiempo, haga clic en la tecla de sincronizar para finalizarlo"
"¡El reloj no está conectado! Conecte su reloj a la interfaz de Ajuste - Cambiar Reloj"
"Inténtelo de nuevo después de que el celular esté sincronizado"
Bienvenido a usar el reloj de salud
Buscando el dispositivo, espere por favor...
Se empareja con fracaso, ¡inténtelo de nuevo!
* Rellene los datos veraces y confiables, a fin de que podamos darle opiniones favorables para usted.
Realizando el ajuste personalizado, espere por favor...
El ajuste personalizado ya termina, está saltando...
*Haga clic en el círculo en la parte superior para entrar en la interfaz de detalles
Ya sobrepasa el objetivo, haga los esfuerzos persistentes!
Haga clic en la esquina derecha por arriba para sincronizar los datos

El reloj vibrará ligeramente para recordarle después de iniciar la función del aviso de los mensajes. Podrá afectar la vida útil de la batería si esta función está iniciada a largo tiempo, ¿seguramente que lo inicia?
* Haga clic en el icono por arriba para elegir el aviso de los mensajes que quiera
El reloj está vibrando, ¡busque el reloj!
Seguramente que apaga el bluetooth del reloj？
El reloj inteligente le recomienda que cada noche se debe dormir con 7-9 horas, al mismo tiempo, debe ir a pie con 10000 pasos como el plan de los ejercicios diarios.
1.Asegúrese de que el reloj y el celular tiene suficiente batería antes de actualizar, y no retire de la aplicación libremente durante el proceso de la actualización;
2.Asegúrese de que el Bluetooth del dispositivo ya está iniciado.
Encuentra la nueva versión del firmware, ¿lo actualiza enseguida?
Verificando la versión del firmware, espere...
Se actualiza el firmware con fracaso, ¡inténtelo de nuevo!
Si cambie del otro reloj, después del cambio, App se sincronizará con su nuevo reloj, y los datos del reloj sustituidos son guardados en la pasada sincronización.
Actualizando la versión de firmwares, el proceso gasta un tiempo, espere por favor...
Termina de actualizar los firmwares, ¡gracias por su espera!
¿Seguro que se borren todos los datos antes recogidos desde el reloj? ¡La operación se podrá recuperar!
¿Seguro que se borren todos los datos antes recogidos desde el reloj? ¡La operación se podrá recuperar!
La cantidad de los despertadores ya llega al límite
Se ajusta el despertador con éxito
Se ajusta la alarma con fracaso, confirme si el reloj está conectado normalmente por favor
1.Where can I download the APP for my smart watch
4.My watch’s app does not sync with my phone’s
5.Intro to each page and their usage
1.How to turn on Bluetooth on my watch

To have a longer battery life for your watch, smart function of the watch is turned off when coming out of the factory.\nFor first time use, please charge (red light will appear) and this will active smart function and Bluetooth.
The first step, into the intelligent school interface.\nIn the APP main interface, click on the "smart school" module, enter the intelligent school interface

The second step, the watch pointer to "zero".\nIn the intelligent school interface, first click "reset", and then respectively, in the APP on the adjustment of the hour hand, minute hand and small needle, so that the hour and minute hands on the watch point to 12 o\'clock position, small needle point 0 / OK position.
The third step, click on the "synchronization", watch the time and time consistent with the phone for the current Internet time, watch school time to complete.
1.Turn on Bluetooth\nPress and hold for 1 second on the watch button, the watch will vibrate once.Small pointer will point to “ON” , then it will point to step percentage, this means Bluetooth is on.
Press and hold for 1 second on the watch button, the watch will vibrate once.Pointer will point to “
” and then it will point to step percentage, this means Bluetooth is off.
Also, you can go to Smart watch APP, under Bluetooth: Settting – select Turn off Bluetooth.
One click operation \nSwitching to different mode by the time holding onto the bottom.
①Button (short press once)\nminute hand point to date; hour hand point to week; second hand point from daily step count to current battery life (in percentage). After 5 seconds, all pointers resume.
②Button Pressd and hold for 1 second (Vibrate once)\nturn on and off Bluetooth, when turn on or off the Bluetooth, second pointer will pion to “ON” or flight mode.

③Button Pressed and hold for 3 second (Vibrate twice)\nturn on the time adjustment mode, in this mode, each click on the button make the pointer move for 1 step; when finish adjusting all pointers, press and hold for 3 seconds (vibrate once) this will let you exit out of the time adjustment mode.
④Button Pressed and hold for 5 seconds (vibrate 3 times)\nTurn on/off the device, when turned off, all pointers point to 12:00.
Apple user can download from App Store
All watch applications can be updated through Hybrid Watch APP
In Hybrid Watch APP setting, select update. The APP will automatically search for newest versions for all applications. Choose the newest version and it will download and update automatically
Attention: this will not occur if application is already at its newest version
1. Make sure the Bluetooth of the watch and the phone are on

2. Make sure that the watch smart module has enough power. Power shortage will lead to intelligent module shutdown, shutdown state is closed Bluetooth, and therefore can not be connected with the phone APP.

3. If the above two steps are completed, still can not connect, it may be the compatibility of the phone itself. Please replace a phone to try to connect again.\nAt present, our watch on the "IOS7.0 and above" and "Android4.3 and above" and also have Bluetooth 4.0 mobile phone models are basically supported. However, due to Android part of the mobile phone models themselves compatibility issues, there will be unstable watch and mobile phone connection or can not connect the situation.
No.11 Guo Tai Road,Tang Tou Community,Shi Yan Town,Bao An District,Shenzhen City,Guangdong Province,China
1.First download our own smart watch APP -- “Hybrid Watch” (Detail steps please see question 1
2.Turn on bluetooth on both watch and phone

3.Select “Start of your journey of health adventure” – Searching devise – device found (select watch) – paring (when finish, the next page will come out)－－personal setting (fill in personal info) – enter to main page
Note: The Bluetooth on our smart watch can only show whether the device is connected, this page cannot be used to pairing up the phone and the watch

Connect to phone all, when complete, click on time synchronization then select reset (all pointer will point to 12), if does not point to 12, use + or – to adjust hr hand and min hand until all point tp 12. Then select sync (watch pointer will then point to correct area); when finishing sync, watch and phone will have the same time

Push Notifications: in Phone APP under Notification page, turn on notifications for phone call, messenger, mail, wechat, QQ etc and this will enable notifications. Light vibration occurs when there are any incoming messages. (Friendly notice: this will shorten battery life)

①Step track\n There Are 2 ways to track steps: 1, based on percentage … 2. Connect to phone App, select Health Management when complete, it will show total step count for the day including activity time, select sync option, and it can show up to 7 days of activity history; when sync is complete, it will show total steps and distance

②Sleep monitor\nsmart watch will determine whether user is in sleep mode and start recording. Connect with phone app and sync all data, synced data will show time for sleep (Deep sleep, light sleep, etc.) smart watch can store up to 7 days of sleeping data

①In air update\n App-under App setting, select update.Click on the mobile phone APP will automatically detect the firmware version of the watch, if detected after the completion of the new firmware, just click on the latest firmware to download and automatically update the watch firmware (when the watch is the latest version of the firmware is not Firmware update)
②Rename smart watch\nunder App setting, Rename, customize adjustment option allowed, can input up to 12 letter, only in combination of letter and number.
③Alarm\nunder phone App alarm setting, user can setup up to 8 alarms, each alarm can be turn on and off manually. Once set, smart watch will vibrate to notify on the alarm.

④Data clearance\nUnder App Setting-Data clearance, select to clear all data (Friendly notice: This function will clear all the data inside the watch, including step, sleep, alarm and other information, please be careful when selecting)
⑤Find my watch\nselect setting-find my watch, watch will vibrate so user can determine watch location
